name: 10.9 "Head Over Hill" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why did Woody want the newspaper?
options: To cut out an article he was in
questions.explanation:
To cut out coupons.

	He told Frasier he was just trying to get to his next paycheck. Frasier told him he decided not to buy a BMW, then he asked Woody what the coupons were for. Woody said, "Food".

questions.text: Who had a pony as a child?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	She said she rode it every weekend, and then she said sometimes she fed it sugar cubes and snickers, but other times she ate it. Then her riding instructor told her she'd "outgrown it".

questions.text: Why does John come to see Sam?
questions.correct: His dumpsters were full with Sam's stuff.
options: He wanted to get a free beer.
His dumpsters were full with Sam's stuff.
questions.explanation:
His dumpsters were full with Sam's stuff.

	Sam said, "So our dumpsters are full what's the big deal?" John replied, "They're not our dumpsters, they're my dumpsters."

questions.text: Rebecca didn't believe Carla could make someone cry. How did she make Rebecca cry?
questions.correct: Told her she got so fat she broke the back of her pony and that's why she couldn't ride it anymore.
options: Kicked her in the ankle really hard.
Told her that she'd never be a good mother and should give up trying to have a baby with Sam.
questions.explanation:
Told her she got so fat she broke the back of her pony and that's why she couldn't ride it anymore.

	Rebecca was sensitive about her weight. Carla succeeded in proving her point to Rebecca, who ran to her office.

questions.text: When Cliff got lost on the horse, where was he?
questions.correct: In front of an adult show place
options: In front of an adult show place
questions.explanation:
In front of an adult show place.

	Cliff called it "the combat zone". The guy behind him kept yelling "Naked, naked, naked."

questions.correct: She slept with John Allen Hill.
options: She was going to lose her job.
She thought Diane was returning to Boston.
questions.explanation:
She slept with John Allen Hill.

	She started pulling things off the wall in the bathroom. She then told Lilith and Rebecca what happened.

Paul.

	Paul was told by Frasier who was told by Lilith. When Lilith got mad at Frasier, he said, "Hey you blabbed first."

questions.text: How did Sam find out about what Carla had done, that upset him so much?
questions.correct: Frasier told Woody and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.
options: Lilith told Woody, and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.
Frasier told Woody and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.
Frasier told Cliff, and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.
Lilith told Cliff, and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.
questions.explanation:
Frasier told Woody and Sam came out of the office, hearing it.

	Frasier tried all the euphemisms for sex but Woody wasn't getting it. Finally, Frasier yelled, "They had sex Carla and Hill had sex!"

questions.text: What was Carla's explanation for what she did?
questions.correct: All the insults and hatred just turned them on.
options: John proposed to her and she was so happy she just couldn't help herself.
questions.explanation:
All the insults and hatred just turned them on.

	Carla and Hill have never gotten along.  Sam said he wasn't angry but then he showed he really was angry.

questions.text: When Sam went to Carla's house, who was there?
questions.explanation:
John.

	Calra told Sam it was just one of those things. Then Hill appeared and she said, "Okay it was just two of those things."
